_comment_language: English, 한국어, 日本語, 中文, Español, Français, Deutsch...
_comment_model: gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4, gpt-4-32k, gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, gpt-o1-mini, gpt-o1-preview...

commitTypes.style: Code style (code formatting, whitespace, comments, semicolons: no changes to business logic)
commitTypes.test: Tests (add, modify, delete test code: no changes to business logic)
commitTypes.chore: Miscellaneous changes like package manager mods, e.g., .gitignore
